descriptions.overview: The Harbor Breeze builders series 52" Armitage ceiling fan features a brushed nickel finish, 5 reversible blades, and integrated light kit which includes an LED bulb.
list: Brushed nickel finish ceiling fan from the Armitage collection features 5 blades with toffee/cocoa finishes for reversible style
Alabaster glass light kit includes one 6.5 watt LED bulb for attractive, energy-efficient illumination
Flushmount ceiling fan ideal for bedrooms

reviews.title: "Excellent Value!"
reviews.text: This ceiling fan is great. Especially for the price. I purchased 3 of them and all 3 had all of the parts, installation was easy, and they look great. I love that the blades are reversible and it's brushed nickle and not white, like a lot of other "budget fans".
reviews.author: Lwilliams

reviews.title: "Cost effective"
reviews.text: I went into this purchase sceptical due to the low price. But after inspecting the quality during an easy installation I've been thoroughly impressed. Bought/installed these in each of our four bedrooms. So far so good. Fan puts out decent air while being almost silent. And the kicker...it has a light kit included with an led light. The led light itself is up for interpretation...but if it's not your preferred temperature it's an easy fix. I also bought the cable extensions with the fan and light bulb at the end. In my opinion it makes the fan look a million times better than the included chain pulls. Color me surprised with the value!
reviews.author: Kimogent

reviews.title: "Great Fan"
reviews.text: We bought 6 of these fans for our upstairs rooms. They took about 30-40 minutes to install. Look way more expensive then $39 and keeps the rooms cool.
reviews.author: Heatherk321

reviews.title: "Great fan for price BUT A NIGHTMARE TO INSTALL"
reviews.text: I have probably installed 50 fans in my life and this one was absolutely a pain that takes over and hour because of all the tiny screws that have to be mounted upside down and sideways. Usually ceiling fan blades have a catch for the two screws that mount the blade to the motor so they wont fall out as fast as you put one in. Fighting the blade with one hand and screw gun in the other left no hand to hold the stupid million screws. Once installed it works well. Led light is bright and has traditional size socket so replacement bulb should be fairly common when the time comes. But do yourself a favor pay a bit more for a fan that goes up far easier especially if your a rookie
reviews.author: Mark

reviews.title: "Great Fan!"
reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my kids' bedrooms and they are great. They were on sale for thirty nine bucks and I couldn't have gotten a better deal. I have another fan in my den that I paid $200 for and this $39 fan is just as good as that expensive fan. It was super easy for my husband to install and it did not take long at all. The light is nice and bright and not dull like some others that I've had in the past. There were several Q and A's about a strong/bad smell coming from this fan after it is first installed and my fan DID NOT have a smell at all. I also saw several reviews that say it runs hot. My fan is on all night and it DOES NOT run hot. I plan on purchasing two more of these fans and would definitely recommend this fan to others.
reviews.author: Angela

reviews.title: "Cheap and quiet"
reviews.text: Needed to replace a fan and couldn't pass up a low price. Was easy to install and runs quiet with good air flow. Fan was installed in a bedroom. I have read complaints about the light being dim. I feel like it provides more than enough light. If i wasn't so cheap I'd replace all my fans with this model. Will buy again as my other fans give out.
reviews.author: JarodR

reviews.title: "What a value for the price!"
reviews.text: When I purchased this item I didn't expect much; but I got much. It was easy to install; but mostly because I'd installed three ceiling fans before. I knew to prepare some items before hanging the motor: preinstalling some screws; removing some already installed screws; etc. We put this in a small spare bedroom and it works quietly, even when turned up all the way. The only extra thing I bought (as the ceiling light boxes are all installed to rafters, so a special box wasn't needed) is chain pulls with a small fan and a light, so the pull chains are easily detected even in the dark. A good buy for the money (and one we're going to put in at least three other rooms!).
reviews.author: CW2SAD

reviews.title: "Great fan"
reviews.text: Installed this in my garage. It moves a ton of air and is very quiet. Every bit is nice to look at as the fans 3-4 times it's price.
reviews.author: Vince

reviews.title: "Best Bang for your Buck"
reviews.text: You get what you pay for, however I only paid $50 and I feel like I got more air movement than $50 is worth. Definitely better than most other builder fans. Pretty cheap quality and a bit tricky to install but again, you get what you pay for.
reviews.author: Jake

reviews.title: "Amazing quality"
reviews.text: I told salesmen, I was looking for a nice ceiling fan. He directed my to these. I was so impressed I bought 4 of them. Couldn't be happier!!!Fishtown born and raised 19125
reviews.author: Smooth

reviews.title: "Easy to install"
reviews.text: I installed this ceiling fan in my garage/man Cave. It was fairly easy to install. I watched a few YouTube videos just to become familiar with installation. You will need to buy a support outlet bracket (not included)
reviews.author: Jorge

reviews.title: "Easy install, low cost, great look"
reviews.text: I was looking for a budget friendly ceiling fan for our Master bedroom. Needed a large size and wanted the brushed nickel look. Considered a few options in the $70 range since I hadn't seen this online. I noticed the brushed nickel option while looking through all the options and an associate opened one so I could see it. Looked very nice and the install was easy. It's been working great since a few weeks ago and is wife approved.
reviews.author: Jeff

reviews.title: "Should be recalled!"
reviews.text: this fan is extremely dangerous and should be recalled immediately. I hung it up and noticed a foul smell coming from it. My son sleeps right above my bedroom. I took the fan apart and I noticed that the motor was extremely hot. This fan could have caused a fire and catastrophic injury. Lowe's and Harbor Breeze should be ashamed for selling this product. I may never shop at Lowes again. And if anyone was wondering, Everything on my end was electrically safe. I hooked up a new Hunter Fan and it worked great. I know you get what you pay for, but putting families in Risk is unacceptable. RECALL IT
reviews.author: Koz

reviews.title: "Do NOT buy"
reviews.text: The fan runs hot. We mounted the first fan. We turned it on and it smelled after a few minutes. It smelled like oil or grease. Not a hot electrical smell. We let it run for 24 hours hoping it would air out. It still stunk. We left it up for a week and my son ran it overnight for 7 days. We returned the fan for a new one and installed the blades only. We shut his door and left it run for 10 minutes. The smell hit you the minute we walked upstairs. We took down the second fan and the motor was hot. The wiring was not. Not an electrical issue. If I could, I'd give it -5 stars.
reviews.author: Cat

reviews.title: "Horrible Smell!!"
reviews.text: I could smell it the minute I opened the box, but didn't think much of it at the time (I assumed it was just a “new fan” smell). Installed it, turned it on and the smell was so overwhelming we had to open windows in 100 degree weather to help air out the house!! Thought it just needed to air out for awhile but the longer it ran the stronger the smell got. We took it down and returned to the store! Bought a completely different fan! Do not buy this fan unless you like the strong overwhelming smell of hot grease & oil mixed with hot metal! The motor was pretty warm too when we took it down, warmer than it should have been for having only ran it for a few hours.
reviews.author: Morgan

reviews.title: "Great fan!!"
reviews.text: This is a great fan! Very quiet, on high and looks great!  Bought a second for when one of our other more expensive fans quit working!
reviews.author: April

reviews.title: "Excellent Fan, Great Value"
reviews.text: We purchased one a few weeks ago to replace an old fan in one of our spare bedrooms. We saw in on sale at Lowes' website. Since we are retired and on a budget, the price was right, but wondered about the quality since it was so inexpensive. Well, much to our surprise it's and excellent fan better than the expensive name brand one that we replaced. It's very quiet, no need to balance the blades and at any speed it does not wobble. We like it so much, we went back the next day and purchased another one for our other spare bedroom. Also, they are easy to install. My wife and I highly recommend!
reviews.author: Semperfimac

reviews.title: "Broken blade handle after a couple of years"
reviews.text: After having in our guest bedroom for a few years, the fan started to make noise.  I went up to check to make sure the blades are balance.  I found that the metal bracket holding the fan blade is broken.  This is in a room that is rarely used.  We hav never had rowdy guests.  I feel very lucky that it didn't break off and cause injury or other damage to our home!
reviews.author: Puper

reviews.title: "Nearly Killed Us All"
reviews.text: Purchased six of these fans new 03/2018 from store # 0484 Lafayette LA, professionally installed. 11/11/2018 my wife woke me choking and coughing. The supplied LED light bulb in one of the living room fans had shorted out and was pumping toxic fumes from the plastic in the bulb. I was able to shut off the fans, pull a table and remove the bulb with a towel. I tossed it into the grass in our front yard. 5 hours later and my wife and I are still coughing and light-headed. Had she not been able to wake me it would have killed us all. No problems, yet, with any of the other fans: BUT if it can happen to one, it could happen to them all.
reviews.author: Landscaper74

reviews.title: "Good fan great price"
reviews.text: This fan is a wonderful value. Easy to install with a few simple tools. I would recommend it to any homeowner as a valuable add-on to the home. We are using it on the ceiling of our Lanai for comfort.
reviews.author: Tom

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: Bought to replace a 15 year old ceiling fan.  Installation was good until it came time to secure the lower collar that connects the dome over the light.  It was designed to be a bit awkward to install the 3 screws required to keep in place.  Honestly that was the only issue I have with the ceiling fan.  Once installed it operated smoothly with no need for balance adjustments.  Quite operation and no jangling with chains at any speed.
reviews.author: Steven

reviews.title: "Love the fan"
reviews.text: I purchased two fans because they were on sale and I ordered online for pick up at my local Lowe's. This fan is very pretty and the blades can be used on either side, depending on the color of your decor. Circulates the air with high power.
reviews.author: Char

reviews.title: "Noxious Odor!"
reviews.text: Fan installed easily enough, looks and works great in my bedroom but the smell - omg! What is that smell?! Its heavy, chemically and gets in the back of your throat and won't leave! I could smell it the moment I opened the box but, after reading all the reviews here, I assumed that the smell disappears quickly since only a few others have mentioned having a problem with it. I've had the fan running for over 48 hours now hoping it'll blow away but Its. Still. There. And since this fan is in my bedroom it's a problem, I haven't been able to stay in the room for prolonged periods of time due to the odor. I'm not one of those people who generally has issues with strong smells but this one has defeated me. Going to take the fan down and back tomorrow. Shame because it fits my decor perfectly and does look and work nicely but if I have to keep sleeping on my couch due to its smell it's not worth it.
reviews.author: Spil

reviews.title: "it smells!"
reviews.text: Good looking for the price but i returned first one due to noxious smell emitting from motor. Company says motors were not “cured correctly from factory”  gave me three options to get a replacement.. i returned to lowes and purchased another in a different color hoping i would get a different batch. New fan still smells just not as strong. They advise me to leave it on for 72 hours to let cure. Before you leave the store open the box and get the motor out of the bag.. if it smells strong dont buy!!  Was gonna do 1 star but a real person answered customer service line in less than 5 minutes! So props to CS! Hopefully smell goes away. If it doesnt ill update my review!
reviews.author: justin

reviews.title: "Horrible odor!"
reviews.text: Returning to Lowes! Immediately after installing this and letting it run for a few minutes we noticed the overwhelming smell of what I thought was wires burning but after reading through the other reviews we realized it's some sort of chemical or grease/oil burning odor that completely  filled our entire upstairs. It's an awful smell that isnt fading after letting it run for a few hours per day. The only good thing about this fan is that it is quiet and does move the air very well. I would NOT recommend buying this fan to anyone. Spend the extra $30-40 on a better fan.
reviews.author: Smellyfan

reviews.title: "Fan problems"
reviews.text: Just bought this fan a couple of days ago and it has a very very overpowering electrical burning smell that caused me a migraine! I was in my room watching TV and the light on the fan was on and the fan going. The light shut off and I noticed a very bad electrical burning smell so I ran over and shut off the switches fearing that there might be a fire! Thought this would have been a nice product but it's a piece of crap! Do not buy, get the more expensive fan that will actually work
reviews.author: Kat

reviews.title: "Poorly Made Fan"
reviews.text: I bought this fan because the reviews for the fan seemed good.  I was hesitant since it only cost $50, but I figured for $50 it was worth a shot.  I found out instantly why it only cost $50.  This fan is horribly made.  The pieces of the fan would not fit together for the fan to function properly.  First the bracket mount would not fit flush.  So the cover housing would not fit flush to the ceiling.  After working with it for some time I finally got that to work.  Then once I put the blades on, they would not spin freely.  Why?  In order for the housing to fit flush it pushed the housing up causing the motor to hit the housing.  I had enough and took this junk back to Lowes.
reviews.author: Partay2819

reviews.title: "Dining room fan"
reviews.text: Bought to replace old lighting. Easy install, looks good and moves the air as intended
reviews.author: Rocky

reviews.title: "Great fan and price"
reviews.text: Great fan gives u an option of a light or dark brown bought two of them one for my bed room and another for my kitchen. The price was amazing easy to install throws allot of air very happy with the purchase.
reviews.author: Jennlg07

reviews.title: "Ceiling Fan"
reviews.text: Order it online; picked it up at the store within the hour, no fuss!  Loved the convenience of online ordering!  The ceiling fan is great, it's quiet and circulates the air nicely.  I'm looking forward to a lower electric bill with this additional fan in my living space.
reviews.author: GAPCH

reviews.title: "Great Fan"
reviews.text: I purchased this fan when it was $49, and saw that it went on sale. Went back to store, got my $10 credit. This fan is just fantastic. I have had it up now for two months, and not one wiggle, or squeak. Very stylish, extremely quiet. Friends think that I spent over $100 for this fan. I am so impressed with this fan, I am going back today and purchasing another fan for the other side of the room. It is by far the best, most stylish and least expensive ceiling fan I have ever seen. I highly recommend that if a ceiling fan is needed in your home, to get this fan.
reviews.author: HL

reviews.title: "Ceiling fan"
reviews.text: Bought 2ea. Was easy to install both. Cheap price for product.
reviews.author: Butch

reviews.title: "Great lookong fan, awfull smell"
reviews.text: I purchase this ceilign fans becuase I was looking for a budget friendly option. I saw some of the reviews complaining about the smell, but decided to give them a try, the installation was easy and everything looked great. I did noticed some smell when i pull the fan out of the box but thought it would go away. After runnig both of my fans I started to notice an awfull smell almost immediatley, I decided to give them a tey thinking the smell would go away, after a month of having the ceiling fans the smell still there. I dont think these ceiling fans should be sold.  Stay away from this ceiling fans at all possible.
reviews.author: Sanchez1799

reviews.title: "Harbour breeze nickel fan."
reviews.text: The fan was a pain out of the box. Also after having it on for an hour or two started smelling smothing either electrical or like gear oil. Took it down and the motor was overheated and smelled. Needless to say tore it down at 1:30 in the morning and put the old one back up and had to air out our bedroom. If could give no stars i would but it only allowed me to put a one. Spend an extra 20. It will be worth it.
reviews.author: Tom

reviews.title: "Ceiling fan."
reviews.text: This ceiling fan was fairly simple to install.  works great.  Very happy with our purchase.
reviews.author: Alex

reviews.title: "Nice!"
reviews.text: Liking my fan. Placed in bedroom. Fan is quiet and lighting is great. Nice surprise for a builder series. Gave 4 stars because of style.
reviews.author: Kuhlrn

reviews.title: "Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fan"
reviews.text: What a great fan for the price $39, easy to install our last one lasted 18 years. A beautiful addition to our living room, 52-inch blades a great addition to any family room living room Den or bedroom I would highly recommend this ceiling fan to anyone that's in need. You don't have to spend an arm and a leg thinking that spending hundreds of dollars you get the best one out there this Harbor Breeze ceiling fan the first one lasted us 18 years I highly recommend went to anyone looking to purchase a new ceiling fan ours runs 24/7.
reviews.author: Sunshine55

reviews.title: "Motor gave out in less than 3 months."
reviews.text: It's very nice looking, not too difficult to put up (light was a bit of a bear), but motor began making a loud noise less than 3 months after installation.
reviews.author: Sandy

reviews.title: "DO NOT BUY THIS FAN (ZERO STARS)"
reviews.text: The smell that comes from this fan is horrendous. I purchased 3 of these fans for my kids rooms and the smell was immediate and will not go away. I can't even get the smell to leave my home at this point and you can smell it in the entire home (2 story home). I am not sure how this fan is still being sold. At this point with all of the time I spent installing and now having to uninstall and return I have lost money. I have owned many Harbor Breeze fans and never had this issue. However this will be my last purchase of their products. I only hope at this point I can get the burn smell out of my home.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Highly toxic ordor"
reviews.text: Purchase this fan for my toddlers room installation was easy but it's not worth it, when within minutes toxic fumes were released into my toddlers room. We have ran the fan for a couple of days only for the odor to get worse and started filling out the hallway to her room. I have read several reviews of this fan and I don't understand why lowes is still continuing to sells this product. Very disappointing. Will be pulling this fan down and replacing with another brand.
reviews.author: Amanda

reviews.title: "Nice fan for the price. Works as advertised"
reviews.text: Got this on sale for 39.99. Purchased the 2 year plan just in case if the motor blows out..  Installation was pretty straight forward. I was able to do it myself without any help but it took about 2 hours to do the whole thing. Installing the blades was the most annoying or difficult part but rest of it was pretty straight forward. Tested everything and it works like a charm.. The room that I put this in is probably a 13 x 11 bedroom and there was plenty of air flow. Please note that the advertised speed for this fan is 2500 CFM.. I had earlier bought an hampton bay from Home depot for the same price and this fan definitely looked better in quality compared to that.
reviews.author: G-Man

reviews.title: "Chemical Smell Overwhelming"
reviews.text: The fan is easy to install; however,  I noticed a smell when I opened the bag with the motor..thought it would go away after it ran a while. It did not and I am on the couch because I cannot be in my room with that toxic smell! I went back to Lowe's and had them open another box and the same smell was there. I would not buy this fan if you want to breath. I give it negative stars.
reviews.author: E

reviews.title: "Looks nice, but low quality parts"
reviews.text: Parts are lightweight and thin, leading me to believe they can break easy.  The fan does look nice when completed, but I will probably spend a bit more next time for a better quality fan.  Installation was standard and pretty easy until the end.  When attaching the light pan to the light kit, there is only about a quarter inch between each screw and the light socket.  Even my 90-degree screwdriver would not fit in there.  I had to unscrew the socket from the light kit to tighten the screws.
reviews.author: Cap

reviews.title: "Incredible value!"
reviews.text: This fan is an incredible value. 52” with 2 colors of blades to chose from. The LED light is a bonus. Our only suggestion would be to remove the screws you use to mount the blades BEFORE you mount the motor to the ceiling, just to save your arms some strain.
reviews.author: Grace

reviews.title: "Great fan for a Great price"
reviews.text: My wife saw a fan very similar to this at another “big store.” The price was 3xs as much. When she arrived at Lowe's and saw this fan on clearance. It was the best deal for this price but the stainless steel finish was what she was looking for. We love the single bulb use. Even the pull chains for the light and fan have the images of the light and fan on the end of the chains just so there's no guessing on which one you want to turn on. Installation is standard as most ceiling fans are. We love this fan and it added a great look for the room we had just painted and made into a den after our son moved out ( he built & purchased his first home). I highly recommend this fan while it's on clearance. Once they are all bought. I imagine that's all for this stock #. Way to go Lowe's!
reviews.author: Happyconsumer

reviews.title: "Affordable Beauty"
reviews.text: Just installed today.Hubby said it was easy to follow instructions, house was pre-wired for ceiling fans.Was super easy to do and install. Great price & the blades match our kitchen cupboards and wood trim on our accent wall. Purchased 2 for our living spaces.Oh yea, with both fans running it helps circulate the air conditioned air and it is SUPER quiet. Much quieter than the stand fans we were using.*Will update after some time to account for use and durability.
reviews.author: Mel

reviews.title: "Great fan for price"
reviews.text: I have three of these fans I put up in my home. Looks awesome and you'd never know it was under 50 bucks
reviews.author: Meghan

reviews.title: "i bought 3 of these fans"
reviews.text: they were on sale 2 of 3 are really loud for a fan taking them all down and returning dont buy these kind
reviews.author: Mac

reviews.title: "Disgusting motor odor that does not go away!"
reviews.text: Beware! This fan shouldn't be sold at all. It's a health hazard giving off strong motor/gear odor that sticks in the throat causing great irritation. I usually do not write reviews but this product can cause health problems; I feel I am obligated to.
reviews.author: Paul

reviews.title: "Quality Budget Ceiling Fan"
reviews.text: Impressed with overall construction of the fan. Mounted very easily. Seems to be working well with no wobble after a couple of weeks. My only complaint is the light bulb provided with the fan is not that great for a larger room. And the glass cover is short enough to not allow a normal sized LED bulb replacement. Will have to find one that fits. Other than that, I am pleased with my purchase and feel it is worth the price.
reviews.author: Manny

reviews.title: "Excellent deal"
reviews.text: The fan was on sale and worth every penny. It is pleasing to the eye, very quiet, the fan and light pulls are long enough for a short person to reach  them, and the light is just right.
reviews.author: Datamom

reviews.title: "Wonderful Product"
reviews.text: We bought this fan as a replacement for a very old fan in the bedroom.  The installation wasn't particularly difficult and the twist on lamp globe was easy to use.  The best thing I like about this fan is that it is quiet!.  We couldn't leave the old one on at night because the hum would never let you get to sleep.  This thing produces a gentle breeze at almost zero noise.  It is also has a very nice appearance.
reviews.author: Jeff

reviews.title: "Toxic Odor - Do NOT Buy This Fan"
reviews.text: This fan seemed like a great deal - it is large, stylish, and was only $40. Now I know why. I installed it and after running it for 40 minutes, the room filled with a toxic smell that made my husband and I sick. We ran it for a few hours, hoping it would burn off, but it never did. We turned off the fan, opened the windows and aired it out overnight and the room still smelled. Had to take it down and install a new fan(different brand this time and not from Lowes), which was a royal pain. From the reviews and posts elsewhere on the internet, I am guessing that some but not all of these fans are toxic so buying them is a bit like Russian roulette. Now I know why the discount on them was so deep. I would give it a negative number rating if I could for all the effort and time it cost me. These fans present a health risk and Lowes should take them off the market rather than sell them at a discount.
reviews.author: Choking

reviews.title: "Motor went bad in 3 months."
reviews.text: Not too bad to put up, looked great for the price, just didn't last. Motor began making a loud noise 3 months after installation.
reviews.author: Sandy

reviews.title: "Yeah it's cheap, but . . ."
reviews.text: Ok, so the Lowe's store I purchased this fan from, did not have it on display. After further inspection of the pics online, I noticed that the pull chains for the fan speed and light switch hang down over the side and rub against the metal light frame. Unacceptable. I've noticed from the reviews that the fan motor might have some quality issues. Those two things plus, it just looks like a $50 ceiling fan, I'm returning mine for a little nicer fan. I'm sure it moves the air as well as any 52" fan would but this model is just not for me.
reviews.author: LindaleMan

reviews.title: "EASY INSTALL"
reviews.text: this fan was so easy to install! We installed 4 fans in about 1.5hours. The directions were easy to follow. We recommend this fan to any homeowner looking for a simply, easy install.
reviews.author: paul

reviews.title: "Great Fan"
reviews.text: We purchased two fans, installed one so far and it's like night and day.  The fan we replaced was super old and did not do well with air circulation.  This one not only looks nicer, but it's quiet, visually appeasing and it is great for circulation to the point of making the room cold (which never happened before without cranking up the A/C).  Definitely happy with this purchase and look forward to the results the second will bring once it's installed.
reviews.author: EAV0503

reviews.title: "slight design flaw"
reviews.text: everything went together well, until the point where you put the part that the globe attaches to. you'd better have a ladder that enables you to climb up to where you can see where the screws go in, because once you get that part in place, if you are below it, it's hit and miss. I was putting this in a kids bedroom, having to stand on the bed because it was too difficult to move. I've put in a lot of fans in my day, and I've never seen a design like this. Other than that, it's fine.
reviews.author: Chris

reviews.title: "Good low cost fan"
reviews.text: Just moved into a new house w/o fans in the rooms. Bought 3 for the kid's rooms. Nice looking, low cost fan to circulate the air in the room. Easy install as well.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Bought for spare bedrooms"
reviews.text: I bought these fans to replace some old ones in my spare bedrooms. Installation was easy and they look great! The light isn't all that bright so I wouldn't use in a large bedroom, but was perfect for the rooms I used them in.
reviews.author: CarsonW

reviews.title: "Great value"
reviews.text: The price was terrific for the quality. I don't know how long it will last but it works as great as the fan I paid $200 for and it has the led light.
reviews.author: Rambo

reviews.title: "Nice looking"
reviews.text: Great looking three speed fan, the fastest speed seems a little slower than others but works & looks great!!
reviews.author: Rick

reviews.title: "I love it"
reviews.text: Great fan,fantastic price. I bough three and they were the perfect fit for all my spare bedrooms.
reviews.author: Fudgie

reviews.title: "All around great fan"
reviews.text: Great indoor and/or outdoor fan. I put mine on the patio overhang and enjoying the cooler breezes, making the outdoor family time most satisfying.
reviews.author: Tom

reviews.title: "Pungent odor"
reviews.text: I would not recommend this fan to anyone. There is a pungent odor almost like an electric smell that won't go away. I will be returning this fan ASAP. This odor is so strong that I had to turn the fan off open a few windows and sit in another room. This fan could potential be a hazard!
reviews.author: Jessica

reviews.title: "Installed 2 in three hours"
reviews.text: Wife and I installed 2 fans in 2 bedrooms. The fans were easy to assemble. The installation could have easily been 2 hours but the screws were stripped in the old fans that we were replacing so it took longer. Definitely a 2 person job. The fans are very quite when running, even on the high setting. Very pleased with the look and finish. Was able to grab these at $35.98 during the Black Friday sale, well worth the price!
reviews.author: AL

reviews.text: After two uses with fan starting smelling electrical smell and can only worked on one speed. Bought a whole different fan to replace. Waste of money and time. You get what you pay for I suppose.
reviews.author: Mo

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: kskelly

reviews.title: "good value"
reviews.text: Installation was easy and all the parts were there! The blades have dark or light colored sides to match up to your room. I was skeptical about the one little bulb but it is plenty bright enough. It is easily as bright as the 2 bulb ceiling light I removed to install it. All in all I'm very happy for the price point. My only knock would be the chain setup for the switches is kind of crappy but I can changer that out for something better easy enough.
reviews.author: Dave

reviews.title: "Beautiful & Easy to Install"
reviews.text: Easy to install by yourself!! Nice and quiet! Looks great too! This is a winner at half the price of the other fan I purchased that took 2 people to install!!
reviews.author: Kirk

reviews.title: "Refreshing breeze"
reviews.text: These fans provide a much need circulation of the air in a well insulated house.  They look good and are quiet.  I got three of them and place on in the living room and one in the kitchen of my mother-in-laws house to facilitate good circulation of air conditioning and (this fall) heat.   Glad to have them. I put the third on up in my living room for the same reasons.
reviews.author: Vern

reviews.title: "Great for the price, but brushed nickel?"
reviews.text: This fan is a pretty nice fan, especially given the $39.99 sale price that I paid for it.  The paddles are the typical faux wood sticker-type wood grain although, from a distance, it's not so noticeable.  The darker wood color is definitely the better of the two as the lighter, more oak looking color seems a bit dated.  Other than that, my only other criticism is that the metal canopy part that hugs the ceiling and the metal ring to which the glass globe attach don't seem like brushed nickel to me.  They look more chrome-ish, and, for the name of the fan to be "...Brushed Nickel...", it seems to me that these two very visible parts should be brushed nickel.  Otherwise, it's a nice fan for a great price.  Installation is easy and straightforward, taking about 20 minutes from start to finish.
reviews.author: BDugai

reviews.title: "Smells!"
reviews.text: Extremely loud and puts off a bad chemical smell! Had to remove it immediately and return. Never buying this brand again. I see why it was on sale for so cheap!
reviews.author: Kayla

reviews.title: "Buying 2 more!"
reviews.text: Fan is made well and installation was way easier than I could've imagined! Had it up barely over an hour. Plan on buying two more.. Thanks
reviews.author: HopSkipandaJump

reviews.title: "Gear Oil Smell"
reviews.text: I just bought this fan a couple hours ago and installed it.  The installation was easy and only took about 30 minutes.  I noticed the smell when I first opened the box, but I thought it was oil on the bearings.  I ready the reviews on this fan where others had a similar issue with the smell.  But for the price, I thought I'd give it a try.  I should have gone with my instincts and left this fan at the store.
reviews.author: Allen

reviews.text: So far so good. It's only been in for about 10 days, but works real well and the light is LED but bright enough.
reviews.author: Rich

reviews.title: "Good price"
reviews.text: I've always loved the air flow the harbor breeze fans have put out as I am hot natured and run a fan year around in my house. This is a good looking fan with a budget friendly price tag. I'd highly recommend this product to everyone.
reviews.author: D

reviews.title: "Excellent purchase"
reviews.text: This was perfect fit and is working as hard as it can during heatwave.  Quick & easy installation.
reviews.author: Wildfire56

reviews.title: "Excellent fan, quiet but be careful"
reviews.text: The fan is relatively easy to install, circulates air well and includes a LED bulb. That said, I strongly recommend ensuring you use a bulb that allows for dimming. One fan, out of 5, shorted out and melted at the socket, coming very close to starting a fire! I'm not sure if the dimming switch was faulty, the bulb or the fan...so just be advised.
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "Great value"
reviews.text: These fans are a great value and are easy to install. Ours has not vibrated since installation
reviews.author: Paul

reviews.title: "Harbor breeze"
reviews.text: Another easy install, very sturdy mounting base, speed control easy to use, very quiet motor
reviews.author: Mario

reviews.title: "Beautiful!"
reviews.text: This is a very beautiful fan fixture that was easy to install! We have bought 3 so far!
reviews.author: Rena

reviews.title: "Cheap and easy"
reviews.text: Installed a few of these Nice price and they look good
reviews.author: He

reviews.title: "LED Ceiling fan"
reviews.text: We bought this for our newly renovated living room & LOVE IT!  It provides adequate lighting and does an amazing job circulating air.  We just purchased another for our spare bedroom!
reviews.author: Piggy2143

reviews.title: "Great fan"
reviews.text: Easy install, this fan looks great, makes no noise and moves the air good!! I saw other reviews that were bad but this fan is well made and good value. Don't hesitate to purchase it.
reviews.author: Ltodd88

reviews.title: "Light bulb is too small."
reviews.text: The lighting options for this fan are limited. It comes with a 10 watt size A15 bulb which is dim at best on a cloudy day and barely lights the room when it's dark outside. I thought I would just replace it with a larger higher output bulb, but an A19 is too long for the globe to go back on. I'm still searching for different bulb options that will fit in the globe. I just assumed that it had a built in LED light because it said LED on the box. Guess I should stop assuming.
reviews.author: Tim

reviews.title: "Another Satisfied Customer!"
reviews.text: Bought two of these at Lowe's to replace 2 failed fans in the basement. Construction is great. Paid less than $36 per fan. What surprised me the most was the virtual zero wobble without any blade weights and balancing marathon. Almost completely silent at at high speed. Took a bit over an hour for each install.
reviews.author: Rich

reviews.title: "Good value fan"
reviews.text: I have put up a few ceiling fans.  This was like your normal one in difficulty.  Look over the directions and you should be good to go.I like the light in this fan because it is not extremely out of the ordinary.  The fan puts out, but now I want one that is larger yet, that's why I gave it 4 stars, not 5.
reviews.author: Hanksterman

reviews.title: "Looks great and low priced"
reviews.text: This fan looks great for only $40 bucks. The way they designed the mounting brackets made it simple to install,I did it by myself in less than 10 minutes. Fan produces a good amount of air. The blades are two different colors, light brown on one side and dark brown on the other for two choices of colors. Only been using it for a day now so I don't know how long it will last.
reviews.author: Carl

reviews.title: "Beautiful fan but doesn't give off good lighting"
reviews.text: Bought this for our living room but taking it back because it leaves our room too dark. Bummed because we loved the way the fan looked (and you can't beat the price!) but it just doesn't give off good light.
reviews.author: Mla

reviews.title: "Beautiful and quiet!"
reviews.text: Fairly easy assembly and diy install- we added a ceiling medallion so we didn't have to repaint the ceiling as the fan that we replaced had a larger base.Looks great and is oh so quiet.Was a little concerned about such a small bulb it does a good job lighting our foyer/hall area.
reviews.author: Off2danz

reviews.title: "Beautiful!"
reviews.text: This fan is gorgeous and works great in my small condo w/ 8- foot ceilings. Quiet, nice breeze.
reviews.author: Cada

reviews.text: Bought and installed three of these.  The directions are straightforward and the fans are an attractive and efficient addition to the house.  Bonus points for being very affordable.  I would have spent more as I like the single dome stying versus multiple light bulbs.
reviews.author: JAMES

reviews.title: "Bad smell"
reviews.text: Just finished installing this fan and can confirm the bad smell, the whole house now smells.
reviews.author: jeremy

reviews.title: "Bargain"
reviews.text: For the money, easy to install, looks nice and moves the air fairly well.
reviews.author: Kent

reviews.title: "Great fan!"
reviews.text: This fan was great! Easy to install and balanced out of the box!
reviews.author: 10gene49

reviews.title: "Awesome fan!"
reviews.text: It looks beautiful and works well. Checks all the boxes!

reviews.text: Easy installation. Clean look and moves air nicely.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Nice and sleek"
reviews.text: Inexpensive and nice fans.
reviews.author: Pamela

reviews.title: "Nice upgrade in ceiling fan"
reviews.text: I am a property manager for number of rental hones and have used this fan on several occasions. It is easy to install and has a nice finished look. My customers like the fact that it can be used for a light or a fan and I like the value.
reviews.author: Nathan

reviews.title: "Good Looking Fan But has Odor When Running."
reviews.text: Bought 3 fans total. All installed easily, all look great. Very quiet and moves a lot of air. Nickle finish should have black blade choice but that's another issue. The last on I installed blows out a putrid odor while running. Not returning as I don't use that room that much. Hoping the odor will dissipate after more usage.
reviews.author: Dave

reviews.title: "Nice looking & quiet but does NOT really blow air"
reviews.text: So for the good, it does look very nice, is very easy and fast to install, and the light is adequate. Now for the horrible: so I opened the box and was almost knocked down by a noxious chemical smell. Not sure, but it felt like off gassing from manufacturing. Zero fan blade screws included, no pull chain ends, and no balancing kit. I made it work and reused screws from the original 36 in fan I was replacing. However, even on the highest setting (in either direction) this fan will barely blow toilet paper. Blade angle is good, but just no airflow at all. Called customer service and they had no clue what the high rpms should be. Mine is around 80. Also they could not send a balancing kit. I purposefully bought this fan for my small 10X10 room because I really wanted a lot of airflow. Now I have less than the old 36 with drooped blades. So now it's up there, and looks great, it's just useless.
reviews.author: GeneralContractor

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: AJ

reviews.title: "Large, high quality fan"
reviews.text: Large (52"), high quality fan.  I purchased 3 and put them in the bedrooms in my home.  Reversible fan.  Nice bright light.  Hugs the ceiling.  It really helps cool the bedrooms on the 2nd floor.  Highly recommend.
reviews.author: LoveSummers

reviews.title: "Easy install and heavier duty than expected"
reviews.text: The LED in this fan/light is a standard base and is very bright. The bulb comes with it and is only 6.5 watts but is plenty bright enough for small room.Easy install ( but I am very experienced) QUIET operation.

reviews.title: "Great Fan!"

reviews.text: Two things: 1) The fan looks good in most room settimgs. 2) It came wired for direct fan and wall switches. ((p.s. After I bought the first one, I went back the next day to buy another.))

reviews.title: "Smelly fan!!!! Chemical odor!"
reviews.text: Put up two of these today, strong chemical odor emitting from it, few minutes after I turned it on. I love harbor breeze and it's disappointing that these are not up to their good standards, too much of a hassle to disassemble and return to store, I probably just won't use the fan, smell is terrible. These should be recalled as I see there is multiple comments about smell and odor emissions

reviews.title: "Harbor Breeze 52” ceiling fan"

reviews.text: I wish the light was brighter, the fan is very nice quality, but the light is very dim. Since it is enclosed in a dome, changing the bulb wont help much.

reviews.text: This is the best bargain I have ever come across for a high quality ceiling fan. Easy to install, very well designed and built. I would give it 6 stars!

reviews.title: "Great Bang for the Buck!!!!"
reviews.text: Installed this fan in our kitchen. My wife does a lot of cooking and it heats the entire living room. We have an open floor plan and there's no cabinets or vent. The fan was easy to put in. Keeps everything much cooler. Worked perfectly & Balanced right out of the box!!!

reviews.title: "Great fan, fantastic price."
reviews.text: I bought three and they were the perfect fit for all my spare bedrooms. Nice look and puts out quite a bit of air. I highly recommend this fan.

reviews.title: "Ceiling Fan - Bedroom"
reviews.text: I bought two of these ceiling fans for two bedrooms in our home. They are quiet and effectively circulate the air. I would recommend them!

reviews.text: Bought this for 3 of our bedrooms, looks great and is quiet with no wobbles. Easy to install and well worth the money

reviews.title: "Nice and attractive fan"
reviews.text: Purchased this fan te replace an existing one that I had. The fan is attractive and has 2 choices to expose the fan blades (a light and dark color wood). The price paid for this fan was $39.00 on sale, which was great for the quality.The reason that I didn't give a higher rating was due to the fact that there is provision for only (1) one light bulb that it came with, and the bulb has to be smaller than a standard one otherwise the light shade won't fit, but if you don't require a lot of illumination, then this fan would be an excellent choice.

reviews.title: "oil / plastic smell"
reviews.text: I got 4 of this fans from lowe's at surprise az . One fan was extremely noisy return the one back. But for $50 don't expect great quality.Back to the smell i had my for 2 weeks got them on July 4 2018 the smell of oil/plastic is less hoping i don't need to replace them . I don't have the original boxes or receipt as of now i give then a[ 3.5] a 5 if the smell goes away.

reviews.title: "Great value!"

reviews.title: "Harbor Breeze 52 inch Indoor Flush Mount Fan"
reviews.text: We really enjoy this fan in our bedroom. It is the first thing we bought for the house. I personally really love it size and cooling capacity perfect for a bedroom or small living space. We live in the south and have experienced a whole lotta fans! The 52 inch Harbor Breeze Fan it's definitely top 5. The price, quality and easy assembly had me sold. Perks like, pictures on the metal pull strings with a brushed nickel finish making the fan easy to clean. Plus the wood on the blades are reversible so you have options all in one. Love it!!!
reviews.author: Kat

reviews.title: "ODD LIGHTBULB SIZE"
reviews.text: I put this fan up a few months ago and the (not so) long-lasting LED light bulb has already gone out.  I didn't realize when I bought this fan that it doesn't take standard light bulbs - it uses a smaller A15 light bulb.  I was so disappointed that I'm having to replace the bulb already, and doubly so upon discovering that I'll also have to use more expensive replacements.  I wouldn't buy this again, despite the fact that it looks pretty good for the $39 sale price I paid for it.  I'll spend what I saved on specialty replacement bulbs.

reviews.title: "Painless install, great air flow, cheap light"
reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Hunter fans. I recently replaced one with this fan, and was impressed with the similar, simple installation. Little touches like the lip to hang the motor on while you connect wires is priceless. 6.5W LED bulb giving full light...blades that you can switch to dark or light... it seems amazing for the price.
reviews.author: BP

reviews.title: "Dim light"
reviews.text: My biggest challenge with this product is the light bulb included is too dim for even a small 10' x 10' bedroom. The  bulb is not a standard size. Sswapping the bulb for a higher wattage is complicated because a standard bulb won't fit in the light kit. I'm returning the product.
reviews.author: Justiffi

reviews.text: We happened to see this on sale and went ahead and bought one to replace a smaller fan we had. Installed it, loved it, and went right back and bought 4 more to replace all the fans throughout the house. They look really classy and sure move the air around

I don't know what kind of stuff they used on this particular fan but its too much.  I had to return this product.  It is quite unfortunate since it is a nice design and the price is right.

reviews.author: Gramma

reviews.title: "Great for the money"
reviews.text: I have two of these in bedrooms, one runs every night for 8-12 hours. Only 2 months old but working well. Complaints: the way they ran the chains through the light kit seems like an afterthought. Nice bushing at the top for the chain but then you feed it through the side of the light housing which causes it to take an angle through the metal which I am sure over time will eat the chain. I tend to pull the chain to the side so it doesn't rub so much.
reviews.author: kw

reviews.title: "Fantastic Fan - Smells Horrible!"
reviews.text: The price was right - easy install, looks great and it actually circulates a lot of air. I'm very happy with that. But is smells so bad. It's been a couple of weeks of running it with the windows open - they keep telling me to keep running it, it will go away. . .I'm frustrated that I may have to redo all of the work to take it down and re-install a different one. I would not recommend the hassle, unless you have the time to let your room air out.
reviews.author: mcpher44

reviews.title: "Can't beat the price for the quality!"
reviews.text: This fan was on sale for $39.97 as a contractor fan. I was a bit hesitant at first because of that but said what the heck. I'm glad I chose to buy it. It not only looks nice for what it is, the air it puts out is amazing! The one downside I would say about this fan is the light is a bit dim. It could be brighter. I'm sure a different globe would help with that. It comes with a “frosted” globe. Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase!
reviews.author: Pete

reviews.title: "only 3 stars due to labeling on box"
reviews.text: BEWARE of the Labeling or lack of on box! I Did not install, as it would not work on a inclined ceiling, it is a flush mount, it mounts flush to a flat ceiling and there is no down rod. this is not stated on the box. had it all unpacked and read the instructions only to discover the above fact. it was going to replace my current fan that is nearly 15 years old and starting to fail. will have to find a different one.
reviews.author: macdaddy

reviews.title: "Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fan"
reviews.text: Very good price for a 52" flush mount ceiling fan.  I understand this is a contractor's retail item, but the brushed nickel finish looks much better than the white.  It would have been nice if it had a better support plate that attaches to the junction box, but the simple one provided did the job.  Easy to assemble and install.  Nothing fancy but looks richer than the price would indicate.  Good buy!
reviews.author: James

reviews.text: The fan has an odor when first used which is not good . It takes several days of constant running and windows open to get the odor out of the house . I've had many fans but this is the only brand with an odor
reviews.author: Rita

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "It holds only "one" LED bulb"
reviews.text: It's very hard to get bulbs with any brightness because the glass dome will only allow smaller height bulbs,not normal bulbs.Then if your lucky to get a brighter LED the light shines in one spot!
reviews.author: Bobby

reviews.title: "Great Fan for a bedroom"
reviews.text: Purchased the fan for our bedroom and it moves the air around with the five blades.  It really looks better after I installed it. I would have rated the fan a five if I had been able to find a spare replacement bulb to keep on hand when and if the original bulb burns out.  The bulb is made odd with a short neck to fit into the glass cover and is not one that is normally stocked.
reviews.author: Nick

reviews.title: "Ceiling fan"
reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong.  The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is because it didn't have a remote control.
reviews.author: Russell

reviews.title: "Light bulb"
reviews.text: Light bulb already blue after 2 months we cannot find another bulb in Lowe's with the correct lumens either the lumens are too high or too low on a 60 watt bulb where can we get a bulb to fit this fan I'm using it in my kitchen I need the bulb and like one of the person said I find it a little dim also especially because I use it in my kitchen help
reviews.author: Geri

reviews.title: "Beautiful and Quiet!"
reviews.text: I purchased this ceiling fan to replace the one in our livingroom. Since we rent our house and the owner was not willing to replace the previous one that died, I didn't want to spend a lot of money and this fan was perfect! Looks beautiful in our livingroom, provides a good amount of air and lighting, and is quiet. And the price couldn't be beat!
reviews.author: dirtwatersun

reviews.title: "Good fan for the price. Globe too small."
reviews.text: Nice fan. Quiet. It supports a E26 base bulb but the globe is too small. Globe should be big enough to accommodate up to a standard A19 bulb. I'm thinking they are doing that because people still use incandescent bulbs which are too hot. LED (and CFL) are the way to go now. Still they should have a larger globe option for A19 LED and CFL bulbs.
reviews.author: Alueim

reviews.title: "Nice Fan for the price"
reviews.text: The installation went well.  Everything came in the box that was needed for installation including the LED bulb.   The fan has a nice clean look to it and operates as stated.  It take 1 60W LED bulb and gives off sufficient light for a standard size bedroom. It is a basic builders fan with no remote but I was not interested in a remote anyway.
reviews.author: Kat

reviews.title: "It holds only "one" LED bulb"
reviews.text: It's very hard to get bulbs with any brightness because the glass dome will only allow smaller height bulbs,not normal bulbs.Then if your lucky to get a brighter LED the light shines in one spot!
reviews.author: Bobby

reviews.title: "Great fan and incredible price!"
reviews.text: I was skeptical about the fan since the price was so affordable and the box didn't have a great picture. Well I was pleasantly surprised. The fan is gorgeous and it puts off a very nice light.  Both sides of the blades are pretty but we went with the darker side, looks almost black.  I would definitely recommend this fan.
reviews.author: Mnelsona

reviews.title: "AWSOME VALUE"
reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for my home. very well constructed, pretty easy to install and assemble. Overall super pleased with items and would defenitly recommend to anyone looking for new fan and wants something besides plain jane wite. the stainless with wood blades is a very nice contrast that will match almost any decor.
reviews.author: edward

reviews.title: "Don't let looks and price decieve you..."
reviews.text: This fan smells like electrical fire when the fan is running. Had the electrician come back who installed it and he told me it was the fan putting off the smell. I left the fan on and the smell doesn't go away. Next time I'll spend the extra money so I don't have to run into this inconvenience. Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Sam

reviews.title: "Light bulb"
reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these fans for my teenage boys. After 1 week the light stopped working in 1 of them. No big deal, just change it. Who knew the bulb that goes in the light has a smaller base than normal bulbs. I guess I will have to buy smaller base light bulbs for this. I wished that was stated somewhere on box.
reviews.author: CD

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: dennis

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Alex

reviews.title: "Easy install - only one problem"
reviews.text: Easy installation.  All parts fit together, mounting hardware and screws went in easily.  Altogether a quick build.  Two minor issues I had was light bulb died in less that an hour of use, and wiring instructions should indicate to feed pigtails back into junction box prior to securing motor to ceiling mount.
reviews.author: Riggs

reviews.title: "Unbelievable for the price!"
reviews.text: I have 4 Harbor Breeze fans in my current home and I had 2 in my previous home.  Harbor Breeze makes a sturdy dependable product and I have no complaints.  I have this fan in my living room (but paid much more for it).  Getting this one on sale was Fabulous! I highly recommend Harbor Breeze ceiling fans.
reviews.author: Dawn

reviews.title: "Perfect for my location"
reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these units and installed in various rooms - they are perfect for the bedrooms and Den area!! I like the frosted globe over the light - it softens the appearance so my guests dont have to look directly into a bright bulb! I am planning to buy another for another room in my house!
reviews.author: Trish

reviews.title: "Great fan for the price"
reviews.text: I bought two of these fans to update my house before putting it on the market.  They looked great and worked perfectly.  Very easy (for my husband) to install.  I ended up buying 6 more to put in bedrooms/game room in the house we are building.  I caught all of them on sale for $40 each.  Great deal!!!
reviews.author: EM

reviews.title: "10 thumbs down"
reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews first. My bedroom stinks only when the fan is running. I thought it was a new smell but no. It only smells when on and I have been running it all day and any time im home. I cant be in the room from the smell. Its not the wiring and it's NOT going away. BEWARE !!!!
reviews.author: mefornow

reviews.title: "Ceiling fan"
reviews.text: I was looking to replace 2 very old fans that were starting to give trouble, but didn't have a lot to spend.  The price on these was great and I like the fact that they're LED lights which will save even more money.  They look so nice and I think I got great fans at a great price too!
reviews.author: Blessed

reviews.title: "We are so happy that we chose this ceiling fan."
reviews.text: We actually bought 3 of the Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit on July 30, 2018.  My husband commented several times as the ease of installing.  In addition, they are absolutely beautiful as well as the cooling they provide.
reviews.author: Joan

reviews.title: "Disappointed"
reviews.text: A good value, nice looking fan. But unbalanced from the start, so using the highest speed impossible. The next highest does not move enough air...so still have to use additional fan in bedroom at night. Not what i had in mind. Expected more from Harbor Breeze in a 52" fan.
reviews.author: Laucul

reviews.title: "Works Great"
reviews.text: Was looking for ceiling fans for a new house and stumbled on these.  Was expecting to pay double what this fan cost ($40). It works great and an easy install. Just wish it had two bulbs instead of one. But hey only $40.  I bough eight of them with no ossues
reviews.author: kafike

reviews.title: "Wonderful Fan, great price, nice look."
reviews.text: Purchased two for my children's bedrooms. The fan motor is quiet even when on the highest setting. Very simple installation, we had both installed in under an hour. Perfect fan choice for those who want an easy install, nice fan without busting the budget.
reviews.author: ASC

reviews.title: "Great Fan Great Price"
reviews.text: This fan is very stylish and the price was very affordable. My husband and I did not hang it yet because I purchased the flush mount but needed a hanging mount for the room that we were installing the fan. Silly me but I will be using it in another room.
reviews.author: Janis

reviews.title: "loud clicking noise"
reviews.text: Fan looks nice and was fine for a few months.  We've had it installed for about 8 months, it now makes a loud clicking noise every few seconds.  Before that it made rubbing sound that you could ignore, but the clicking is too annoying to continue using.
reviews.author: Tvargas

reviews.title: "Same as others SMELL"
reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! Motor gets VERY hot and puts off a stink. This smell will never go away. Horrible product
reviews.author: Smitty

reviews.title: "Decent fan for the price"
reviews.text: Nice fan for the price, it's very quiet, well balanced, looks good and was pretty easy to install. The separately sold Harbor Breeze remote works good with it as well but was a bit of a challenge to mount as space is limited under the motor cover.
reviews.author: GDunn

reviews.title: "Needed a great bedroom fan, this is it."
reviews.text: Hot bedroom demand a fan. Bought and installed(VERY EASY) the harbor breeze fan.  The fan with the Light included made a world of difference.Visitors in the spare bedroom commented how comfortable the room was on a very hot evening.  Great value!
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "Ceiling Fans"
reviews.text: We bought two of the HB Armitage ceiling fans and we love them both. The brush nickel finish fits perfectly in both our kitchen and living room. Besides the look, we're very pleased with how quiet they are. The variable speeds are nice too.
reviews.author: churningurn

reviews.title: "Easy Install and Decent Fan"
reviews.text: Very simple install and has everything needed to support the fan while hooking it up. The only thing that would make it probably a 5 star fan is more light. The light on this fan is not very bright, at least with the bulb that is included.
reviews.author: Dub

reviews.title: "Decent looking fan, great price dim light."
reviews.text: This ceiling fan uses a non standard A15 bulb.  Good luck finding one with a decent light output.  Most seem to range in the 450 to 500 lumen range.  It's not bright enough for a room that would use this large of a fan.  Very poor design.
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "Works amazing!"
reviews.text: Needed two more fans for the bedroom before the summer come again. Just to look at them and end up buying the cheapest 52in fan, husband and I end up loving it so much we bought another one for the master bedroom. Definitely recommend!
reviews.author: Shellys

reviews.title: "Perfect room fan"
reviews.text: Installation was easy for one person. Replaced a wobbly pendant fan with this flush mount. I liked it enough to go back and get another.  The only issue was the bulb ms on both of them went out In 2 days. Got new bulbs and no problems.
reviews.author: Vino685

reviews.title: "Excellent value"
reviews.text: This fan meets or exceeds expectations for a contractor grade fan.   I installed the fan in my mother's kitchen / dining nook.  The fan produces good airflow, is not noisy, and was simple to install.  I would buy this product again.
reviews.author: JH

reviews.title: "First time installing a ceiling"
reviews.text: Made some adjustments with the main bracket to make it solid still when fan in use. No shaking, vibration, or noise.  Perfected! just like a pro. beautiful fan. Bought two and going for more. Wish it had duel light bulbs or more.
reviews.author: osito

reviews.title: "Good price.. Modern look"
reviews.text: We used these fans in all of the rooms for our recent remodel and went back last Saturday and got another one for the kitchen. Nice look love the LED lights you don't have to climb up and change them every couple months.
reviews.author: Mwm

reviews.text: I love the fan and the price.  The only problem was with the five fans I bought the bulbs blew in two of them within the first couple days.  I don't know if that's a problem with the fan or if the bulbs were bad.
reviews.author: Julie

reviews.title: "Great for rentals"
reviews.text: I bought and installed 5 of these fans for rent houses. They are relatively easy to install and work as good as those I've paid much more money for in the past. It even came with a LED light bulb inside the box!
reviews.author: skindive4fun

reviews.title: "Great price, great product"
reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these fans because they were on sale and loved them so much we purchased 2 more! They look great, super easy install, they are very quiet and definitely add the finishing touch to each room.
reviews.author: Bobbie

reviews.title: "Affordable & looks good!"
reviews.text: Love the way this fan looks in our master bedroom.  It's looks good without having to pay so much for a fan.  The light is bright, fan is quiet & it puts out tons of air circulation.  We are very satisfied.
reviews.author: Jennifer

reviews.title: "Solid but inexpensive"
reviews.text: This fan was bought for the kids room so my price for the fan had to be on the lower end because boys break things. I was surprised by how solid the fan was for the price. I would recommend this to anyone
reviews.author: Sandman

reviews.title: "Living Room Fan"
reviews.text: We replaced the fan in our living room with this model. It works very well. Only complain is that it only has one bulb and doesn't supply the same amount of light that we had with the old fan/light combo.
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Great ceiling fan so far"
reviews.text: Super easy to install and super quiet and stable. I didn't have to install any of the counter weights on the blades. It was perfectly stable out of the box. Absolutely recommend. Can't be beat the price.
reviews.author: Rich

reviews.title: "Great fan for the price"
reviews.text: After buying the first one for a bedroom, I loved the look of it and the lighting of it that I subsequently purchase 2 more for other bedrooms. Easy installation and a nice update to the bedrooms.
reviews.author: ben

reviews.title: "Great product at a great price!"
reviews.text: This is a beautiful, high quality fan. I was amazed of how nice it was for the price. The two color blade option (light or dark wood) was a nice plus. I would definitely recommend this product.
reviews.author: T

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: mary

reviews.title: "Five speed harbor Breeze ceiling fan"
reviews.text: I installed a harbor breeze five speed ceiling fan Four years ago in our dining room and it gets used summer and winter we are very very please with this ease of operation in its appearance
reviews.author: Fred

reviews.title: "Burnt Smell! BUYER BEWARE! No stars!"
reviews.text: Please heed to the reviews that the fan have a burnt smell. Might be bad motor manufacturing. The smell woke my kid up, if she wasn't crying we would have never noticed. I'd avoid this fan.
reviews.author: Wayne

reviews.title: "Harbor Breeze 52 inch fan"
reviews.text: I've installed many ceiling fans and this one was pretty it's pretty easy. I would recommend that you pay attention to how the ceiling bracket goes up it's really easy to that incorrectly
reviews.author: ptvegas

reviews.title: "Great fan, great price"
reviews.text: I purchased this fan to replace the light in my bedroom. It was a great price and it looks amazing! Easy to install, quiet motor, great output of air. Looks more expensive than it was.
reviews.author: Kate

reviews.title: "Only ONE "fault" deters me from a 5-star rating. ."
reviews.text: The one "fault". . a REALLY ugly light fixture . . . which I am changing out (which will cost me a few dollars)  Otherwise, it looks good; and, moves air "quietly" and efficiently. . .
reviews.author: Brian-the-Builder

reviews.title: "Great fan, decent light"
reviews.text: Installation was easy with provided instructions. The light is subpar within the provided bulb, it is only one bulb, so perhaps a brighter watt would help. Can't beat it for the price.
reviews.author: Cortnek

reviews.title: "Easy to install"
reviews.text: This is a very nice, simplistic looking fan for the price. It is quiet and works well. We have one installed in 2 rooms.  It is efficient, and most importantly was easy to install!
reviews.author: MorristownResident

reviews.title: "Updated fan"
reviews.text: Out with the old, in with the new! I love the sleek look of this fan. The single light was not what I was looking for but when I saw it on display at Lowe's I fell in love with it.
reviews.author: D

reviews.title: "Loved the ceiling fan!"
reviews.text: Loved the ceiling fan, but my building manager would not let me install it!  Says it conflicts with the sprinkler system!  Gave the fan to a friend who is very excited to have it!
reviews.author: Jude

reviews.title: "I am a Fan"
reviews.text: I have installed three of the Harbor Breeze fans,  Excellent selection.  They even reduced the price.  No problems, fans are quiet and do the job.  Easy to install.  Why pay more?
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Nice fan"
reviews.text: We had to replace a fan in sons bedroom. This one is perfect. Simple, with no remotes to lose or malfunction and nice modern look. Very quiet and efficient. Bonus it was on sale.
reviews.author: Mom

reviews.title: "Great fan!"
reviews.text: I bought two of these when we moved into our new house. They were a great price, the perfect size for their rooms, it's nice and quite and they look fabulous. I'm very pleased.
reviews.author: Theamarie

reviews.title: "Best bang for the buck!"
reviews.text: Well-engineered ceiling fan that installs quickly & easily!  Plus, wide base that fits directly against ceiling minimizes any wobbling if/when your blades become unbalanced.
reviews.author: Iceman

reviews.title: "Perfect For Our Room"
reviews.text: This is a well balanced fan coming right out of the box.  It was very easy to mount and assemble and at this price a bargain.  I plan on buying another for my other bedroom.
reviews.author: Michael

reviews.title: "Perfect for the price"
reviews.text: Works great, light is pretty poor but I rarely used tge ceiling light anyway No reason to get a more expensive modelSlight smell when running, went away after a few weeks
reviews.author: Kit

reviews.title: "No bright lights"
reviews.text: Great fan ! Great price and works well very smooth but the light is not bright at all. Went to Home Depot to get brighter one only have 60W. Will keep trying other places.
reviews.author: Ray525

reviews.title: "Easy Install"
reviews.text: I have installed many fans and this one was one of the easiest. Great design on the mounting of the motor to ensure ease of wiring. Fan works great at a fantastic price...
reviews.author: Dave

reviews.title: "Replacement fan"
reviews.text: Replaced a fan that was working fine, but didn't have a light. It was compact enough to not hang too low in the room. Looks great, works fine. Also comes with LED bulb.
reviews.author: George

reviews.title: "Bedroom Fan"
reviews.text: This is a nicely made product. Very much nicer than I expected for a "builder quality" fan. I'll be installing one in the other bedroom too! Thanks for a great price!
reviews.author: Bobo

reviews.title: "Builders value ceiling fan."
reviews.text: Great economical fan for apartment bedroom.  Easy to install and both light and fan work great.  If you are looking for an economically priced fan you can't go wrong.
reviews.author: Ron

reviews.title: "Great buy."
reviews.text: This fan is prettier than the pictures and very quiet. It was a great price,easy to install and shipped fast. I couldn't be more pleased with the whole transaction.
reviews.author: Rick

reviews.title: "Great value"
reviews.text: These were perfect for putting in my new house. It would be nice if there was an option to mount it with a downright, but they were easy to install and look great!
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "Great Value"
reviews.text: I bought 3 for the ceiling in my attached garage to replace older fans that had started to show signs of age. I couldn't have asked for a better value. Well built.
reviews.author: Richard

reviews.text: It was a little confusing to put together but once I figured it out it went up in 15 minutes and it works great and looks good
reviews.author: Nick

reviews.title: "52 inch fan"
reviews.text: I hung this fan in the dining room and it has made a tremendous difference in that room.  Since putting up the fan the airconditioner doesn't seem to run as much.
reviews.author: Dub

reviews.title: "Excellent bang for the buck!"
reviews.text: this product is excellent! a bit of work to install but once done it's a solid, soundless and none vibrating fan. One of the best ones I've seen. Gonna get more!
reviews.author: Updater

reviews.title: "Good quality and easy to install"
reviews.text: We were surprised that such a good quality fan did not break our bank.  We bought and installed two!
reviews.author: Walt

reviews.title: "Budget"
reviews.text: Light too dim and only could feel breeze if sit directly underneath fan.Probably ok in a tiny room but not for an average size room.Installation was easy !
reviews.author: LowesCustomer

reviews.title: "did not come with light kit as advertised"
reviews.text: I purchased this item based on the description and reviews.  No light kit included.  Not sure if I am going to return or not... very disappointing Lowes!
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "For the party that  "Yeah it's cheap, but . . ..."
reviews.text: there are 2 holes in the plate above the that.  You sent each light and fan chain through those holes.  Works fine. Look for the 2 holes  They are there.
reviews.author: Cactusman

reviews.title: "Good quality and easy to install"
reviews.text: We were surprised that such a good quality fan did not break our bank.  We bought and installed two!
reviews.author: Walt

reviews.title: "Lowe's Ceiling Fan"
reviews.text: The fan was easy to install. Instructions were provided but not necessary if you were replacing and existing fan. A very good product at a low price.
reviews.author: Sophia

reviews.title: "good price, easy installation"
reviews.text: On sale for $39. It was a good buy. the fan blades are 2 toned, dark wood on one side, medium/light wood for the other. It goes nicely in any decor.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Harbor Breeze Celing Am"
reviews.text: Great.  We have a small kitchen and this ceiling fan worked perfectly for the area.  Plan to purchase the same style for living room and 1 bedroom.
reviews.author: none

reviews.title: "Great price"
reviews.text: Just be ready to put together every inch not like quick connect things and run fan on all speeds to get noises out . Overall great fan great price.
reviews.author: Patti

reviews.title: "Flush mount ceiling fan with LED bulb light kit."
reviews.text: Fan was very easy to install.  Looks very good over my dining room table. I really like the LED light, saves energy and provides adequate lighting.
reviews.author: Emily

reviews.title: "Harbor breeze fan"
reviews.text: I bought a couple of the Harbor breeze fans for my rental property. They look great and hold up a long  Time. I was so glad to catch them on sale.
reviews.author: Penny

reviews.title: "HARBOR BREEZE FAN"
reviews.text: WAS PACKED VERY WELL, AND ALL THE PARTS WERE IN THE BOX. THE FAN IS NOISY AND IF YOU HAVE BAD HEARING THIS IS THE FAN FOR YOU,BUT IT DOES WORK OK
reviews.author: KARL

reviews.title: "Perfect fan!"
reviews.text: Very easy to install was shipped right to my door. Love the pull chains and puts out a lot of air! Very please to the eye. Definitely recommend
reviews.author: Crissy

reviews.title: "Ceiling Fan"
reviews.text: Very helpful store employee directed us to this fan as we were doing a garage install. Great price & a great product, just what we wanted.
reviews.author: ezed123

reviews.title: "Greay home addition at good price"
reviews.text: Bought two for the kids bedrooms. Improved comfort level and the appearance in both rooms. Additionally, they were easy to install myself.
reviews.author: DJ

reviews.title: "Harbor Bay Team"
reviews.text: How is Harbor Bay Team addressing and explaining the smell issue. For the price, it may be an acceptable inconvienence, but what say you?
reviews.author: ANDREW

reviews.title: "good fan"
reviews.text: bought 2 and installed both in under 3 hours.  Look good in both rooms.   Only had them up and running for 2 weeks but work fine so far.
reviews.author: mick

reviews.title: "Good fan for the price"
reviews.text: Got this fan on Black Friday pretty cheap and must have lucked out cause no noticeable smells or sounds. I would definitely buy it again
reviews.author: Matt

reviews.title: "Nice fan"
reviews.text: This is probably the best bang for your buck. The fan is very nice and very quiet. Easy to install. Would definitely purchase again.
reviews.author: Jorgerodriguez1990

reviews.title: "Inexpensive but worth it!"
reviews.text: Installed 3 of these fans throughout the house, the instructions were cut and dry, great that they came included with the LED bulb.
reviews.author: ZachR

reviews.title: "Good to decent fan."
reviews.text: Great fan, only issue is the blades don't hold up well with hot or humid conditions. (In case one was to use in a shop or outside).
reviews.author: Rocket

reviews.title: "Nice fan. Nice price!"
reviews.text: This was a replacement fan as we are selling our home and didn't want to spend a fortune. Great buy for the price and looks good!!
reviews.author: Ciccolellajones

reviews.title: "Great fan"
reviews.text: I have two of these fans in other parts of my home. Lighting is great and variable speeds makes it great for different room sizes.
